next_steps.step: Confirm with the customer that the product A ratio aligns with their needs and if not, propose alternative solutions or a different product mix.
Investigate the impact of the previous sale of product B and address any potential concerns the customer may have regarding its suitability or performance compared to current offerings.
Capitalize on the strong Iberia engagement by showcasing successful case studies in the region and offering tailored support to further solidify the customer's confidence.
